entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 15.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 22. Humidex 30. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 after midnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
